channel.title: Need help for a quest
channel.description:
I'm making a quest and i have a problem that i dont know how to solve it :
How do i make when i kill a npc to give you EXP ?
Example : Killing a zombie -> recieve exp after he die.
Thanks for reading , if you have any idea reply .
